parsed.plot: DEV: Rance and Talia consummated their relationship; she discovered preference for sexual submission/degradation; established semi-official partnership (known to Circle/Selenay only). PEND: Talia must report to Selenay while still bearing physical evidence of coupling; formal arrangement yet to be presented to Queen.

entities.c: STATE: virginity taken by Rance; bite mark on breast; physically marked. ARC: crossed threshold from untouched to claimed; discovered arousal from submission/degradation; surrendered control for first time in adult life; broke years of self-denial. STANCE-Rance: sexually claimed; responds intensely to dominance and crude language; begged to be degraded during sex; needs him as partner who understands her completely; decided to recommend formalizing connection to Selenay as co-advisors (semi-official—Circle knows, public doesn't); shields waver around him but he can shore them up; terrified of losing herself but trusts him to prevent it.

STANCE-Rance: resigned acceptance their lives became complicated; concerned about untrained Mage-Gift use (door slam, potential fire lighting); maintains physical distance during intimate moments but cannot fully shield through bond; pragmatic about time constraints. STANCE-Talia: protective; understands she needed vulnerability/surrender after years of isolation.
